LABEL: 0x3BA
STRING: The bell sounded, signaling the end of a long class.

LABEL: 0x415
STRING: ...Whew, it's finally lunch break. Somehow, today felt stupidly long.

LABEL: 0x482
STRING: If I didn't have to go to school, I'd definitely not go.

LABEL: 0x4E7
STRING: Yes, just like Cycoh!

LABEL: 0x52A
STRING: I yawned loudly and pulled out my smartphone.

LABEL: 0x585
STRING: ...Should I continue to watch from where I left off yesterday?

LABEL: 0x5D2
STRING: What's on my screen right now is the Hanabishi Channel.  Cycoh's channel.

LABEL: 0x643
STRING: It was more interesting than I thought. I spent all of last night bingeing her archives.

LABEL: 0x6AE
STRING: Thanks to that I didn't get enough sleep today...

LABEL: 0x79A
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x7A8
STRING: "Oh, what a cute girl! Is she a U-tuber?"

LABEL: 0x937
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x945
STRING: "...Huh? Metarou, so you were interested in that sort of thing?"

LABEL: 0xA37
STRING: Yukimaru, who was peeking at my screen, teases me.

LABEL: 0xB4F
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xB5D
STRING: "Ah, isn't that the U-tuber Cycoh-chan? So Metarou watches her too. How unexpected〜"

LABEL: 0xC6D
STRING: Nana jumped out from behind Yukimaru.

LABEL: 0xD68
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xD76
STRING: "Oh, Nana, you know of her?"

LABEL: 0xEF1
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0xEFF
STRING: "Of course, of course〜! I know! I'm a big fan!"

LABEL: 0x1092
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x10A0
STRING: "She's cute, and her videos are funny and awesome!"

LABEL: 0x118E
STRING: Apparently, Nana knew a lot about Cycoh.

LABEL: 0x128B
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1299
STRING: "Oh, I don't really watch this stuff, so I didn't know."

LABEL: 0x142C
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x143A
STRING: "I'm sure she's the same age as us! That means we could be classmates!"

LABEL: 0x15CD
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x15DB
STRING: "And there's a rumour that she's not going to school, though I'm not sure why."

LABEL: 0x1778
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1786
STRING: "I wonder why? I've never seen her mention it in any of the videos."

LABEL: 0x1915
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1923
STRING: "Next time she does a Q&A, I'll submit something〜!"

LABEL: 0x1A1B
STRING: Nana was proudly showing off her Usatuber knowledge, but unfortunately for her, I already knew...

LABEL: 0x1A90
STRING: ...After all, I heard it directly from the source yesterday.

LABEL: 0x1B83
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1B91
STRING: "You should watch the Hanabishi Channel too, Yukimaru〜! Cycoh-chan's so cute, and she's really funny!"

LABEL: 0x1D40
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1D4E
STRING: "Well, I don't mind but... I'm not good at this kind of thing. ...Is it the type where they try to disparage and cancel everything?

LABEL: 0x1EF3
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x1F01
STRING: "She's not like that at all〜! She's a myth-busting type, so she does a lot of silly experiments! You can even watch while you're eating♪"

LABEL: 0x20DC
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x20EA
STRING: "Hmm, is that so. Well, if Nana says so..."

LABEL: 0x2279
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x2287
STRING: "Oh, but if there's gross stuff like puking on stream then give me a break!"

LABEL: 0x2418
STRING: Nana

LABEL: 0x2426
STRING: "Don't worry, don't worry! Cycoh-chan's very considerate to her viewers! I mean, that would start a huge flame war! Ahaha!"

LABEL: 0x25E9
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x25F7
STRING: "I guess that's true! Hahahaha!!"

LABEL: 0x2711
STRING: ...Er, why are these guys flirting in front of my desk? Get a room.

LABEL: 0x29CA
STRING: ─After school.

LABEL: 0x2A03
STRING: Nana and Yukimaru went out on a date together.

LABEL: 0x2A5A
STRING: Damn you normies, it's not like I'm jealous of you or anything! Die.

LABEL: 0x2B03
STRING: I casually wandered off to the park alone.

LABEL: 0x2B64
STRING: I wonder if Cycoh will be in the same place as yesterday...

LABEL: 0x2BC1
STRING: ...Nah, I guess I'd be too much of a stalker if I said that.

LABEL: 0x2C2C
STRING: Gloomily, I sat down on the same bench as yesterday and took out yakisoba bread that I bought at the convenience store.

LABEL: 0x2CAF
STRING: After watching her videos yesterday as well as today, I noticed that each video could be enjoyed in less than 10 minutes.

LABEL: 0x2D5C
STRING: It's a good way to pass the time. I can see why the students are so fascinated with it.

LABEL: 0x2DE3
STRING: Once you've finished watching, you'll somehow get the urge to watch other Usatubers as well.

LABEL: 0x2E60
STRING: ...By the way, how long does it take to shoot a 10-minute video?

LABEL: 0x2EDB
STRING: I'm pretty sure I spent two or three hours yesterday on that silly balloon experiment.

LABEL: 0x2F44
STRING: And there's not just filming, there's also video editing and stuff, right?

LABEL: 0x2FA5
STRING: Ah, thinking about it seriously, the effort must be mind-boggling.

LABEL: 0x3088
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x3198
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x3275
STRING: As soon as she saw me, she screamed in surprise as if she'd seen a dead body.

LABEL: 0x337E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x338C
STRING: "Why, it's Metarou! You friggin' scared the hell out of me!"

LABEL: 0x3535
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x3543
STRING: "Ah, I see, you're just off school! Of course, students leave school around this time! I've been away from school for too long, so I forgot about that〜!"

LABEL: 0x371C
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x372A
STRING: "...Hehe, we meet again! Dude, are you a stalker?"

LABEL: 0x38D7
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x38E5
STRING: "Are you following me? I don't mind, but don't follow me back home! Got it!?"

LABEL: 0x3A00
STRING: Oh yeah, she's a "delinquent"... Or something like that. And that response really makes me wonder how long she's been away from school.

LABEL: 0x3AA7
STRING: I'm curious about it, but I was kind of hesitant to ask since it's quite a sensitive question.

LABEL: 0x3BDE
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x3BEC
STRING: "Ah, but let me warn ya! Never say "Let's be friends♪" to me!"

LABEL: 0x3D8D
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x3D9B
STRING: "Hmmhmm, I don't need any friends!! They're no use to me!"

LABEL: 0x3E9A
STRING: Don't ask me why I'm so certain about it, but it's got to have something to do with the fact that she's not going to school anymore.

LABEL: 0x3F2A
STRING: Well, first, let me try asking a normal question...

LABEL: 0x406D
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x407B
STRING: "Oh! Interested, are you? Actually, I've got something special in store for today!"

LABEL: 0x4178
STRING: Something special...!

LABEL: 0x41B3
STRING: I'm excited to hear those words and I can't wait to hear more details.

LABEL: 0x42BE
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x42CC
STRING: "You know the Kubitori Tunnel? If you live around these parts, you must've heard of it, right?"

LABEL: 0x43D5
STRING: When she sees me looking puzzled, she's taken aback.

LABEL: 0x44E2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x44F0
STRING: "Haah〜. Metarou, you really don't know anything, do you!"

LABEL: 0x4691
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x469F
STRING: "You don't know about the Kubitori Tunnel?! It's a famous haunted spot around here! Everyone's favourite place for a test of courage♪"

LABEL: 0x47D0
STRING: Eh...

LABEL: 0x4807
STRING: Of all things, a test of courage!

LABEL: 0x4850
STRING: When I was growing up, my mother told me never to go to haunted places, so it's a place that I have no experience with.

LABEL: 0x48CD
STRING: You might meet something unnatural or have something scary happen to you. Anyway, it's not a good idea to go to that place, that's for sure.

LABEL: 0x497E
STRING: I'll never go, and maybe Cycoh should reconsider too...

LABEL: 0x49E2
STRING: With that in mind, I decided to give it to her straight.

LIST.STRING: No offense, but you'd better stop...
Are you insane...? Better change your mind now.

LABEL: 0x4B41
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4B4F
STRING: "Gyahaha!! What're you so scared about!?"

LABEL: 0x4CD0
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4CDE
STRING: "I'm not a psychic, I've never seen or felt anything supernatural, so it's fine!"

LABEL: 0x4E87
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x4E95
STRING: "Gyahaha! I'm perfectly sane! I'm going, no matter who tries to stop me!"

LABEL: 0x5050
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x505E
STRING: "I've been to a lot of those places before, but nothing's ever happened!"

LABEL: 0x51F1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x51FF
STRING: "I've heard footsteps and tapping sounds coming from nowhere, and I've even seen a weird black shadow! Heeheehee!"

LABEL: 0x53BC
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x53CA
STRING: "See, that's all that happened, so it's okay, okay! It's perfectly safe!"

LABEL: 0x54D3
STRING: No, I feel like we're already crossing a pretty dangerous bridge...?

LABEL: 0x553C
STRING: If I recall, those things she talked about are exactly the signs to watch out for in haunted places...

LABEL: 0x559F
STRING: When the air is heavy, when you hear sounds, then you start to see spirits... like that. I don't want to feel that.

LABEL: 0x56B0
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x56BE
STRING: "Come on, I can't be a U-tuber if I'm scared of that much!"

LABEL: 0x585F
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x586D
STRING: "Even if we have to put our bodies on the line a little bit, we'll bring the very best entertainment to our viewers! Isn't that what being a U-Tuber is all about!?"

LABEL: 0x5994
STRING: Mmm... I can't really say if I'm convinced.

LABEL: 0x59E9
STRING: People who can draw in large audiences like her exude a strange confidence so I never know what they might do.

LABEL: 0x5A66
STRING: No matter what I say, she has her pride as a professional on the line. It's useless... I can't stop her.

LABEL: 0x5B95
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5BA3
STRING: "But let's face it, psychic and paranormal stuff gets a ton of views. Didya know that?"

LABEL: 0x5D52
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x5D60
STRING: "People are curious, you know? They're scared to go there themselves, but they want to see it!"

LABEL: 0x5E79
STRING: ...Well, you have a point! I'm one of those people.

LABEL: 0x5EDE
STRING: People don't want to put themselves in danger, but they're interested in seeing something spooky.

LABEL: 0x5F67
STRING: The same goes for people who don't want to play horror games by themselves.

LABEL: 0x5FCC
STRING: That said, I still can't bring myself to go.

LABEL: 0x60C9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x60D7
STRING: "...and of course you're coming along, right? Right? You're coming right? Right?!"

LABEL: 0x6203
STRING: No, no, no, what the hell are you saying, are you seriously going to drag me into this?

LABEL: 0x627C
STRING: I shake my head vigorously but she puts her hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x6383
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x6391
STRING: "Don't worry, don't worry! Let's go! It'll be fun for sure!"

LABEL: 0x6486
STRING: Is she an idiot? ...It's definitely not going to be fun.

LABEL: 0x64E1
STRING: As I continued to refuse her, Cycoh sadly lowered her eyes.

LABEL: 0x660E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x661C
STRING: "What, you're not going? Thats's so boring... I thought I'd finally found a buddy I can go shooting videos with..."

LABEL: 0x6731
STRING: Ugh...

LABEL: 0x6766
STRING: To tell the truth, my heart was a little stirred.

LABEL: 0x67B9
STRING: I don't know if I can continue to spend my days like this, doing nothing.

LABEL: 0x681A
STRING: If I continue to help her like this, maybe I'll get more friends.

LABEL: 0x6883
STRING: If I cooperate with her, I might just be able to enjoy what's known as "youth".

LABEL: 0x6900
STRING: This might be a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity for me, a person with no personality and nothing to offer.

LABEL: 0x696D
STRING: If it's for the sake of changing these boring days, I guess it can't be helped!

LABEL: 0x69CC
STRING: She's so popular, I've got no choice but to follow her...!

LABEL: 0x6AB9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x6AC7
STRING: "Hehe, that's how it should be〜!!"

LABEL: 0x6BA0
STRING: When I finally agreed to go, Cycoh rubbed her nose happily.

LABEL: 0x6E50
STRING: I met up with Cycoh at a nearby station.

LABEL: 0x6EA7
STRING: The time was 2 a.m., the perfect time for a test of courage.

LABEL: 0x6F00
STRING: I slipped out of the house a little early and waited for her on the side of the road, fiddling with my phone in the meantime.

LABEL: 0x6F75
STRING: Kubitori Tunnel, huh...

LABEL: 0x6FB8
STRING: I decided to do some research on my destination.

LABEL: 0x701B
STRING: "I heard footsteps coming from a tunnel that was supposed to be empty."

LABEL: 0x707A
STRING: "While passing through the tunnel, I was approached by the ghost of a woman wearing a kimono."

LABEL: 0x70E3
STRING: "If you encounter a woman with a sickle, she will take your head..."

LABEL: 0x7142
STRING: As I read through the posts about the rumours, I got goosebumps.

LABEL: 0x71AB
STRING: Hey, are you kidding me...? This is the place we're going to go to?

LABEL: 0x7214
STRING: Ugh, this is all for the sake of fame and youth... but I regretted agreeing to it so lightly.

LABEL: 0x7299
STRING: A little later, Cycoh showed up just in time.

LABEL: 0x73A1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x73AF
STRING: "Oho? You're quick! All pumped up and raring to go?"

LABEL: 0x7492
STRING: Even at this late hour, her energy is still the same.

LABEL: 0x74EB
STRING: Sheesh, if you're so cheerful I'm sure the ghosts wouldn't want to come out.

LABEL: 0x7558
STRING: I don't believe in ghosts or anything like that, but if something like that happens, I might have no choice but to believe in it.

LABEL: 0x7681
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x768F
STRING: "...You're really coming? Alright! Let's go! Kubitori Tunnel, here we come!!"

LABEL: 0x7824
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7832
STRING: "Wait up, ghosts!! This U-Tuber Cycoh-sama is gonna exorcise you all! Ha ha ha!!"

LABEL: 0x795A
STRING: Cycoh and I decided to head for the Kubitori Tunnel.

LABEL: 0x79BB
STRING: There were no cars, so we walked steadily along the dimly lit road.

LABEL: 0x7A1C
STRING: We walked side by side in the dead of night.

LABEL: 0x7A62
STRING: Along the way, I mentioned something that had been bothering me for a while.

LIST.STRING: It's fun as you don't have to think too much.
Being a Usatuber is a fun job, isn't it?

LABEL: 0x7BD2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7BE0
STRING: "...Mm. For real? Mmmmmm, sorry to burst your bubble, but unfortunately, it's not that simple."

LABEL: 0x7DA1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7DAF
STRING: "...It's not all fun and games, try it and you'll see. It's not easy. It's hard work. It's physical work."

LABEL: 0x7F74
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x7F82
STRING: "And there's a lot of stuff you've gotta worry about."

LABEL: 0x811B
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8129
STRING: "Like you say something funny, meant to be a joke, but then!! It gets slammed for being offensive!"

LABEL: 0x82C2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x82D0
STRING: "If you go into a place that's off-limits, you're gonna piss off people."

LABEL: 0x846F
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x847D
STRING: "If you leave stuff uneaten, waste food, or throw up during a mukbang... you're gonna come under fire by haters!"

LABEL: 0x8638
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8646
STRING: "It's all about how to make interesting content while following the rules, without troubling or offending anyone."

LABEL: 0x87EF
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x87FD
STRING: "It's also a competition with other U-Tubers. Naturally everyone fights for the hot topics and you gotta be careful not to do something that's already been done."

LABEL: 0x89C6
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x89D4
STRING: "There're some people who get flipping mad and go "You copied me!" even if you didn't do it on purpose."

LABEL: 0x8B99
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8BA7
STRING: "It's a tough world, isn't it, with all the overly-sensitive folks out there? It really is. Like those feminists."

LABEL: 0x8D58
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x8D66
STRING: "I mean, do you think we do all this without putting any thought into it? I know I'm an idiot, but even I've got to use my head quite a bit, you know?"

LABEL: 0x8E8D
STRING: Before I realized, she had worn a serious expression on her face.

LABEL: 0x8EF0
STRING: ...I see. That's how it is... You've got to follow the rules laid down by others. It's not an easy road.

LABEL: 0x8F7D
STRING: You've got to mind your manners and not offend or trouble the people around you...

LABEL: 0x8FE2
STRING: That's something that should be obvious, but I bet many people don't do it.

LABEL: 0x9059
STRING: Surprisingly, I seem to have caught a glimpse of Cycoh's "considerate" side.

LABEL: 0x912B
STRING: As we were talking, we arrived right in front of the Kubitori Tunnel.

LABEL: 0x9192
STRING: Even though it's summer, there's a chilly wind blowing, and the atmosphere is unsettling.

LABEL: 0x92AC
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x92BA
STRING: "Whew, it's kinda cold! Nice, I'm shivering all over〜!"

LABEL: 0x944B
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x9459
STRING: "I'm getting the creeps all of a sudden. Metarou, why don't you go on ahead?"

LABEL: 0x964E
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x965C
STRING: "Pretty please! Even I'm scared of scary things〜!!"

LABEL: 0x974F
STRING: Getting cold feet, the two of us began to make the other go first.

LABEL: 0x97A6
STRING: I'd rather we both just walk side by side...

LABEL: 0x980B
STRING: But one of us has to hold the camera and the other has to hold the light.

LABEL: 0x9920
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x992E
STRING: "We're not making any progress, there's no other way then..."

LABEL: 0x9AB9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x9AC7
STRING: "Hey, look, I've got something good here!"

LABEL: 0x9BB0
STRING: She removed the square stone that was attached to her choker.

LABEL: 0x9CA9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x9CB7
STRING: "We'll roll the dice, and the one with the biggest number wins! The loser walks in front! How 'bout that?"

LABEL: 0x9DC8
STRING: It's true, we can't just sit around and do nothing. I reluctantly agreed to her proposal.

LABEL: 0x9F07
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0x9F15
STRING: "Hup!"

LABEL: 0x9FDA
STRING: She rolled the dice and got a 3.

LABEL: 0xA0C9
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xA0D7
STRING: "Oho!!! This ain't good... It's too small...! Maybe I've lost!"

LABEL: 0xA1F8
STRING: Then I rolled and got a 4.

LABEL: 0xA2E1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xA2EF
STRING: "Oooohhh!!! How did this happen!!! I can't go in front! No way no way!!! Nooo way!!"

LABEL: 0xA3FC
STRING: I had my thoughts on the matter, but I felt like it was meant to be.

LABEL: 0xA465
STRING: No matter how you look at it, it would be better for views if I held the camera and film Cycoh than the other way around.

LABEL: 0xA580
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xA58E
STRING: "Shit... I regret it, but a promise is a promise!! I'm going ahead!"

LABEL: 0xA72F
STRING: The tunnel was pitch black, and the only light was the flashlight that Cycoh was holding.

LABEL: 0xA798
STRING: The sound of dripping water is echoing from somewhere.

LABEL: 0xA7F9
STRING: The graffiti on the walls, the black stains... everything is starting to look creepy.

LABEL: 0xA864
STRING: I feel like I'm overreacting to every noise or little thing.

LABEL: 0xA8D3
STRING: Even though it's the middle of summer, I feel the chills on my skin...

LABEL: 0xA928
STRING: ...I hope that's all it is.

LABEL: 0xA96B
STRING: Naturally, I'm scared of ghosts, but right now I'm alone with Cycoh.

LABEL: 0xA9D4
STRING: Unconsciously the distance between us becomes a little closer.

LABEL: 0xAA2B
STRING: Then maybe our hands would naturally touch each other, or maybe Cycoh will grab my arm...

LABEL: 0xAA92
STRING: Why, what's with this weird feeling, my heart is aflutter.

LABEL: 0xAAED
STRING: Is this... that suspension bridge effect?

LABEL: 0xABE2
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xABF0
STRING: "What's the matter? You're being quiet, Metarou."

LABEL: 0xAD7B
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xAD89
STRING: "Geh!!? What, you're not... already possessed, are you...? Gimme a break already〜!!"

LABEL: 0xAEA0
STRING: To Cycoh, I....

LABEL: 0xAF2B
STRING: How could I not be aware of it?

LABEL: 0xAF72
STRING: I mean, she's a pretty girl around my age.

LABEL: 0xAFD1
STRING: How can a healthy boy not get excited under these circumstances!

LABEL: 0xB030
STRING: No matter how boyish her words and actions are, she's wearing flashy, revealing clothes and she's got a huge rack...!

LABEL: 0xB0A9
STRING: ...Ah, right. No one's around to see us here...

LABEL: 0xB0FC
STRING: I put my hands on the wall and trapped her between my arms.

LABEL: 0xB1F1
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xB1FF
STRING: "Oh? What, Metarou?"

LABEL: 0xB2D6
STRING: Huffing and puffing, I move my face closer to hers.

LABEL: 0xB3F7
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xB5B7
STRING: At that moment, my vision is suddenly cut off.

LABEL: 0xB604
STRING: I went black, and the next thing I saw was...

LABEL: 0xB69F
STRING: Red.

LABEL: 0xB6D8
STRING: I was in a bright red room.

LABEL: 0xB71D
STRING: I didn't understand my situation, but while looking around, I noticed that this room was being filmed by a camera.

LABEL: 0xB7A4
STRING: ...Is this a video, or is it a live broadcast...?

LABEL: 0xB7FB
STRING: Thoughts whirled around my head.

LABEL: 0xB84C
STRING: Wasn't I at the haunted spot with Cycoh just now...?

LABEL: 0xB97C
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xB98A
STRING: "Yo, everyone in front of the screen."

LABEL: 0xBB01
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xBB0F
STRING: "Hello, Utube! Welcome〜! It's the myth-busting Usatuber 'Cycoh' live on the Hanabishi Channel, yo〜!"

LABEL: 0xBCCD
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xBCDB
STRING: "Today's event is the one you've all been waiting for, the 'Red Room'! Have you heard of it? It's the Devils' livestream."

LABEL: 0xBE99
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xBEA7
STRING: "I get suggestions from our viewers on what to do with our prisoner here, then I'll do my best to live up to your expectations!"

LABEL: 0xC046
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC054
STRING: "Mischief, violence, killing... anything goes! The fate of our prisoner depends on you, the viewer!"

LABEL: 0xC207
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC215
STRING: "Viewer participation makes for the best kind of entertainment, doesn't it? It'll definitely be fun!"

LABEL: 0xC3CA
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC3D8
STRING: "Without further ado, who wants to give me some instructions to start with? Gimme the best ideas ya got, guys!"

LABEL: 0xC4EC
STRING: Please choose what you would like Metarou to go through.

LABEL: 0xC654
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC662
STRING: "Heeheehee... You've made quite the interesting choice! This is why I can't stop streaming...!!"

LABEL: 0xC832
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC840
STRING: "Sorry! This is what the audience wants. No hard feelings!"

LABEL: 0xC9DB
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xC9E9
STRING: "Gyahahaha!! Oi oi oi oi!! Look, Metarou, aren't the numbers wild?!"

LABEL: 0xCBA0
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xCBAE
STRING: "We've got over a million viewers! One million achieved, and it's all thanks to you! Thanks, Metarou!!"

LABEL: 0xD410
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xD41E
STRING: "Heeheehee... You've made quite the interesting choice! This is why I can't stop streaming...!!"

LABEL: 0xD5F3
STRING: Cycoh

LABEL: 0xD601
STRING: "Let's get this show on the road!"

LABEL: 0xD6E4

STRING: Somehow, it feels I had just gotten my ticket to success...

LABEL: 0x113E5
STRING: In the darkness, the flame of a candle sways and flickers.

LABEL: 0x11440
STRING: It's not that he doesn't have electricity, but he likes to spend his time in nothing but candlelight.

LABEL: 0x114BD
STRING: He always does this when he needs to calm his spirit.

LABEL: 0x1151A
STRING: It's like a curse, or a ritual. Like praying to some deity. Like clinging to something, anything.

LABEL: 0x11587
STRING: While remembering in secret, the humiliation he experienced as a child.

LABEL: 0x11606
STRING: "...Shit."

LABEL: 0x1164A
STRING: He turns on the computer and as soon as it boots up, opens his favourite website.

LABEL: 0x116BF
STRING: On the screen is a video posting community called "Usatube". In short, "Utube."

LABEL: 0x11764
STRING: It's a place where video contributors from all around the world gather.

LABEL: 0x117B3
STRING: The people who upload videos there are commonly referred to as "Usatubers" or "Utubers".

LABEL: 0x1181C
STRING: He seems to be staring at the numbers displayed on the page.

LABEL: 0x1189B
STRING: He muttered quietly, then an unpleasant high-pitched sound echoed through the room.

LABEL: 0x1191C
STRING: "Not enough, not enough, not enough..."

LABEL: 0x11976
STRING: Creak creak creak creak...

LABEL: 0x119C5
STRING: It was the sound of someone chewing on their own fingernails.

LABEL: 0x11A64
STRING: Usatube.

LABEL: 0x11A9A
STRING: The only way I can express myself right now... is this.

LABEL: 0x11AF3
STRING: This is all I have... this is all I have left to live for. I've forgotten what else is worth living for.

LABEL: 0x11B88
STRING: I don't care what it takes to get the numbers, anything goes as long as it makes me money. I'll do anything as long as it gets me publicity.

LABEL: 0x11C11
STRING: It's hard for a newcomer to beat an old-timer. For the sake of winning, for the sake of climbing that wall, I must try anything.

LABEL: 0x11CA0
STRING: If that's what it takes, you've got to take some risks. As long as you survive, there's no problem.

LABEL: 0x11D11
STRING: If you put your body on the line, if you stand out, then you'll get noticed. It's short-sighted, but it's the right step to take. As long as you can avoid getting cancelled...

LABEL: 0x11D9C
STRING: For a long time, my parents didn't understand what I was thinking. They didn't do it. ...No, they didn't even try.

LABEL: 0x11E37
STRING: They told me it wasn't realistic to do what I wanted to do, they denied me a lot of chances. They tried to destroy all my futures.

LABEL: 0x11ED4
STRING: "If we could eat by doing that stuff, we wouldn't be having such a hard time."

LABEL: 0x11F43
STRING: "Yeah, you're dreaming too much. How can you put food on the table using the Internet?"

LABEL: 0x11FF9
STRING: Apparently, it's the job of parents to kill their children's dreams, hopes, and potential.

LABEL: 0x1206E
STRING: ...Haha.

LABEL: 0x120A3
STRING: Bet you're surprised now?

LABEL: 0x120D8
STRING: Both the way society works and the way business is conducted are changing along with the times.

LABEL: 0x12139
STRING: You underestimate the formless world of the Internet. You're the ones who haven't kept up with the transfomation.

LABEL: 0x121B6
STRING: What have you learned up till now?

LABEL: 0x1220B
STRING: You've lived more than twice as long as I have, and what have you learned?

LABEL: 0x12274
STRING: It feels awfully silly to be lectured by people like you...

LABEL: 0x122E1
STRING: ...so I decided not to hold back any longer.

LABEL: 0x12375
STRING: The day I silenced my parents forever was the day my life really began.

LABEL: 0x123F0
STRING: Still, there were times when others made fun of me or criticized me.

LABEL: 0x12453
STRING: But I didn't stop. I kept going. I kept fumbling in the dark. I kept rethinking my methods because I wanted to be popular. Because I wanted the numbers.

LABEL: 0x1251C
STRING: Because I wanted to get my revenge.

STRING: I constantly and unconsciously bring my fingers to my mouth.

LABEL: 0x126CF

LABEL: 0x127B1
